title: Back to Green Gables
description: Back to Green Gables is a fictional adventure based on events that might have happened!! Anne of Green Gables Fans - This is for You! Treat yourself to a few hours of Fun at Green Gables with Anne and some new Kindred Spirits! The Cover has changed slightly in the newest version available via Amazon Prime. Made in America-Printed in America
author: Wendy Kolar Mullen
